## DynamicValueBindingSource type

Binding source for `toDynamicValue`

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DynamicValueBindingSource<T> = {
    type: BindingType.DYNAMIC_VALUE;
    value: ValueFactory<T> | DynamicValueProviderClass<T>;
};
```
